group_1.textRight: Ahem! So let's go over what we know about @the case so far.

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, you really are like a detective.

group_1.textRight: Ahem! The victim was Hinano Miyako...@

[chara:200401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, you said "kids" before...[chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]are you older @than me?!

group_1.textLeft: What's the problem?!

group_1.textRight: Oh, nothing, nothing![chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1] ...Anyway! Let's@start again from the top!
Ahem! The victim was Hinano Miyako.
While she was preparing some chemistry@experiments for the students...
WHACK! The culprit attacked her from behind!@...Right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah, just like that! Right when I@was getting things ready!

group_1.textRight: Was anyone with you when this happened?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, no one.

group_1.textRight: No one at all? You were totally by yourself?

group_1.textLeft: Well, school's off today. No teachers, no@students.
And the kids coming to watch the experiments@aren't supposed to be here until later.
So yeah, I don't think anyone was around.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see... So you were alone.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Probably wasn't a Witch either...

group_1.textRight: Huh? A Witch?

group_1.textLeft: Don't mind me! Just talking to myself.

group_1.textRight: Hinano, any chance you're a...Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: Wait, if you're askin' me that, does that@mean...you are too?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I am. Whoa, that's one heck of a@coincidence, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: So you came here chasing a Witch...@
Does that mean a Witch was what hit me on@the back of the head?
But hang on, I didn't sense anything at all!

group_1.textRight: Right, right, it wasn't a Witch.
I thought it might be one back when I heard@that scream...
But when I got here, I didn't sense any.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, thought so.
I mean, whoever heard of a Witch doing a @hit and run?
But that means we aren't any closer to@figuring out who the culprit might be...

group_1.textRight: When I first got here the door was closed.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I closed it while I was preparing the@experiments...
I never heard it open, either, so I don't@think they got in that way.
What do you think, Magical Detective?

group_1.textRight: Magical Detective?! [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]Oh, I like that! @Sounds cool!
Ahem! Well, if the culprit didn't enter@through the door...
That means they absolutely must have come@through the window!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! Yeah, this room's on the first floor!@AND the window was left open!

group_1.textRight: Oh, when I got here, the curtains were@blowing in the wind!
That proves that the window was open!@In fact...it's still open right now!

group_1.textLeft: So they got in through the window...meaning@it wasn't necessarily a teacher or a student.
The person who hit me coulda been someone@from outside the school!

group_1.textRight: Sure could! [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:motion_300][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]But if it was an outsider...
They probably fled back out the window,@so it'll be hard to catch 'em...

group_1.textLeft: But we also have a clue!

group_1.textRight: We do?! What is it?!

group_1.textLeft: My scientific know-how is about to blow @your mind!

group_1.textRight: Huh? What do ya mean?
